news.title: ‘Poland closest it’s been to open conflict since World War Two,’ says Tusk as Harris calls Russian incursion a ‘wake up call for the West’
Micheál Martin dealt blow as Fianna Fáil TDs revolt over choice of Jim Gavin for Áras
news.summary: Taoiseach Micheál Martin has been delivered a shot across the bow from Fianna Fáil backbenchers after the vote on the party’s presidential nomination was tighter than expected.

news.title: Second digger excavating ground at search site for missing boy
news.summary: Gardai searching waste ground on the edge of the north Dublin town of Donabate for a boy who is missing and presumed dead have now brought a second mechanical digger to the site which is now actively excavating at the scene.

news.title: Leaking ceiling, ‘rotting floorboards’ and lack of fire alarms: Oasis fan’s ‘shocking’ Airbnb experience in an alleged illegal let
news.summary: An Oasis fan who rented an Airbnb ­property in Dublin for €700 a night has called on the letting website to do more to protect the safety of guests after her “shocking experience” in an alleged illegal let.

news.title: Dublin Airport apologises after overcharging 4,500 car park customers – here’s how you will get full refund and additional discount
news.summary: The Dublin Airport Authority (daa) has apologised after a “pricing system error” led to 4,500 customers being overcharged a total sum of €25,000 while using the airport’s parking facilities earlier this year.

news.title: EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen says she will propose new measures targeting Israel
news.summary: The European Commission president said Wednesday she would seek sanctions and a partial trade suspension against Israel over the war in Gaza, an announcement that marked a sharp turnaround for Ursula von der Leyen, a longtime supporter of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

news.title: Details scant on Katie Taylor’s new husband after first appearance together – but here’s what we know so far
news.summary: Mystery surrounds the new husband of Katie Taylor following the happy couple's first appearance in Co Wicklow.

news.title: Who is Jim Gavin? Potentially the first president with no experience for constitutional role
news.summary: Jim Gavin will certainly buck a trend if he is inaugurated as president in Dublin Castle in November.

news.title: Why I’m trying hypnobirthing to make my second labour a more positive experience
news.summary: As can happen, the more awareness of hypnobirthing has grown, thanks in part to celebrities from Meghan Markle to Giovanna Fletcher reportedly using it in labour, the more details can get muddied online with half-truths, oversimplifications and overwhelming amounts of information.

news.title: Cork dairy farmer becomes first female FBD Young Farmer of the Year
news.summary: Aileen Sheehan, a dairy farmer and teacher from County Cork, has been named the 2025 FBD Young Farmer of the Year.
